sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Coup leaders in Niger give the French ambassador 48 hours to leave the country as ECOWAS hopes for a peaceful solution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Spain's winning World Cup team is on strike demanding Federation President Luis Rubiales resigns for kissing Jenny Hermoso. Military coup leaders in Niger have given the French ambassador 48 hours to leave the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The letter to Sylvain Ete comes a month after generals ousted President Mohamed Bouzoum in the July 26th rebellion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, ECOWAS has told the country's leaders it's not too late to reconsider their position. INSPECTOR-GENERAL MOHAMMAD BAZOUM, UNITED STATES UNITED STATES INSTRUMENTS INCLUDE THE USE OF FORCE.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: SO IT IS VERY MUCH ON THE TABLE AS ARE THE MEASURES THAT WE ARE WORKING ON. BUT IF PEACEFUL MEANS FAIL, ECHOWAS CANNOT JUST FOLD IT HANDS.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: GENERALS WHO OUSTED PRESIDENT MOHAMMAD BAZOUM HAVE CALLED FOR A cannot just fold its hands. Generals who ousted President Mohamed Bouzoum have called for a three-year transition period, while ECOWAS demands the immediate return to constitutional order.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The French Foreign Ministry has said the coup leaders don't have the authority to expel the French ambassador.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Less than a week after winning the Women's World Cup, Spain's national team is on strike. La semana pasada, después de ganar la Copa de la Mujer, el equipo nacional de España está en ataque.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Los jugadores dicen que no jugarán más juegos hasta que el presidente de la Federación de Soccer del país resignase.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Después de que Luis Rubiales besó al jugador Jenny Hermosa en las uñas, eso ha provocado angustia nacional e internacional. in national and international anger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Rubiales apologised for the incident but said the kiss was consensual, something Hermosa denies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He's refused to resign and has cast himself as the victim of a witch hunt by what he called false feminists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The president of Spain's women's league said she wasn't surprised at Rubiales' response and added his ego is above his dignity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spanish police have announced the record seizure of almost nine and a half tons of cocaine during an operation in the port of Algeciras.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The huge drug shipment was discovered hidden in boxes of bananas on board a maritime container arriving from Ecuador.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police said the packages had been stamped with more than 30 different logos corresponding to the European criminal networks that were meant as the recipients.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The cargo is due to be moved to Portugal for later distribution throughout Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: No arrests have been made so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Interest rates in the eurozone must stay as high as necessary for as long as necessary, says European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Over the past year, the European rate has risen from 0.5% to 3.75%, the fastest rise in the euro's history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Lagarde says there has been progress, but the average eurozone inflation rate is 5.3%, far from the 2 percent target.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's a target shared by Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve Jerome Powell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The director of London's British Museum is stepping down following a series of thefts from the collections of one of the world's most prestigious cultural institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hartwig Fischer has been under pressure since the announcement earlier this month that a series of items from the collections, some dating back to the 15th century BC, had gone missing. It has since emerged that the museum was made aware of the thefts in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In his resignation statement, Mr Fischer said he accepted that the museum did not respond as comprehensively as it should have at the time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: did not respond as comprehensively as it should have at the time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The historic first-ever mugshot of a U.S. president has caused quite a frenzy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Newspapers feature it on their front pages, and Trump opponents are using it in their campaigns rather than earlier fake or photoshopped versions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Trump supporters, however, are offering T-shirts with the image and an inscription of his quote �Never Surrender� for a mere $47 contribution to the campaign.
